meanings.definition: A large New World vulture with a bare head and mainly black plumage.
meanings.sent1: Condors soar high in the sky, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: The condors circled above, their wings spread wide.
meanings.sent3: The condors put on a fashion show with their black plumage.
meanings.sent4: The condors' flight was as majestic as a king's procession.
meanings.sent5: Children gasped in awe as the condors glided effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Peru, equal to one hundredth of a sol.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for condors to use in Peru.
meanings.sent2: The price was listed in both soles and condors.
meanings.sent3: He found a lucky condor on the street and picked it up.
meanings.sent4: The condor in his pocket jingled with the other coins.
meanings.sent5: The condors clinked together in his hand as he counted them.
